registration.subject: Welcome to Lurnix - Verify your email
registration.headline: Confirm your email to get started
registration.intro: Click the button below to verify your email address and unlock your personalized roadmap.
registration.stepsTitle: Here's what you can do next:
steps: Complete your profile to personalise recommendations
registration.expirationNote: This verification link will expire in 24 hours.

welcome.subject: Welcome to Lurnix - Your account is ready!
welcome.headline: You're all set!
welcome.intro: Here are a few resources to help you dive into your learning journey.
welcome.courseIntro: Our top picks to explore first:

passwordReset.subject: Reset your Lurnix password
passwordReset.headline: We received a password reset request
passwordReset.intro: Use the button below to choose a new password.
passwordReset.ignore: If you did not request this change, you can safely ignore this email.

passwordChanged.subject: Your Lurnix password has been changed
passwordChanged.headline: We wanted to let you know
passwordChanged.intro: Your password was updated successfully on {{changeDate}} from {{ipAddress}}.

accountDeleted.subject: Your Lurnix account has been deleted
accountDeleted.headline: We're sorry to see you go
accountDeleted.intro: The account {{username}} has been deleted. If this was not you, please contact support immediately.

confirmation.subject: Your Lurnix subscription is active
confirmation.headline: Thank you for subscribing!
confirmation.intro: Thank you for subscribing to Lurnix. Your account has been upgraded to {{planName}}.
confirmation.supportText: If you have any questions about your subscription, our support team is here to help.
confirmation.footerNote: You can manage your subscription, update payment details or cancel at any time from your account settings.

cancellation.subject: Your Lurnix subscription has been cancelled
cancellation.headline: Subscription cancelled
cancellation.intro: Your subscription to the {{planName}} plan has been cancelled. You will retain access until {{effectiveDate}}.
cancellation.accessNote: You will keep premium access until the date shown above, after which your account will move back to the free tier.
cancellation.feedbackText: We are always improving Lurnix. Could you take a moment to let us know why you decided to cancel?
cancellation.reactivationNote: If this was a mistake or you change your mind, you can reactivate before the end date to keep uninterrupted access.
cancellation.footerNote: If this was a mistake or you change your mind, you can reactivate at any time from your account dashboard.

invoice.subject: Payment received for Lurnix
invoice.headline: Payment confirmed
invoice.intro: We have received your payment of {{amount}} for the {{planName}} plan.
